Document.Focus: Living with a chronic illness - dealing with feelings

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Living with a chronic illness - dealing with feelings ?
QAPair.Answer: Learning that you have a long-term (chronic) illness can bring up many different feelings. Learn about common emotions you might have when you are diagnosed and live with a chronic illness. Learn how to support yourself and where to go for more support.
